description.heading: Hello! Tell us about yourself.
description.text: Help us get to know you better & we’ll begin matching you to the best opportunities! Remember, your details will be shared with our team and employers on Oliv in order to get in touch with you.

handicapDeclaration.title: Disabilities and People of Determination
handicapDeclaration.description: To help us achieve our objective of empowering <1>People of Determination</1>, we invite you to voluntarily provide demographic information. Inclusion of this information will enable employers who are supporters of People of Determination to identify you.

description.heading: Tell us your educational background
description.text: What's the highest level of education you're currently pursuing or have completed?

educationDetails.label: Academic details
educationDetails.text: Tell us what you studied. If you have more than one degree, click "Add New University".

additionalCertifications.label: Additional certifications
additionalCertifications.text: List any other training, courses, or programs, that you'd like to share.

normalizedGrade.title: Normalized grade
normalizedGrade.description: Grades from different academic systems that are standardized to a grade range from A to F.

description.heading: Tell us about your past experiences.
description.text: Add details about previous internships, part-time or full-time jobs. You can mention downprofessional, voluntary, or passion projects.

workExperience.label: Work experience
workExperience.text: Please add your work experience. If you don't have experience, you can add academic achievements, coursework, clubs, or projects you've worked on.
workExperience.hasExperience: Do you have any work experience?
workExperience.description: Please describe your main responsibilities in this particular position. Mention any special projects or achievements (min. 30 characters).

volunteering.label: Volunteering activities, hobbies or passion projects
volunteering.text: What you spend time on when you're not at work or school

interests.label: Interests
interests.text: Choose your special interests. These can be things that you do or just enjoy learning more about.

skills.label: Skills
skills.text: We will use these skills to show you the most relevant opportunities so choose wisely — you can only add eight!

autoApproveConfirmation.title: Your confirmation is required
autoApproveConfirmation.description: Hold up there, partner. It looks like you have 6 or more years of work experience. Are you sure you want to continue creating a profile on Oliv? The majority of entry-level career opportunities on Oliv pay between $1,500 - $3,500 gross salary per month, depending on the industry and the location..

options.approve: I understand and I am interested in job opportunities in this salary range.
options.decline: I do not wish to proceed and would like Oliv to delete any personal information I have entered.

description.heading: Tell us your preferences
description.text: Tell us the specifics about the kind of opportunities you are looking for.

salaryExpectations.label: Salary Expected
salaryExpectations.average: Help us find you jobs that match your expectations. This information will only be visible to the Oliv team.

profileVisibility.label: Profile visibility
profileVisibility.text: <0>You have the ability to control the visibility of your profile. A public profile allows you to share your profile and makes it accessible via search engines. A private profile will only be visible to registered users on Oliv.</0><1>See a sample public profile</1>

availability.label: Availability
availability.text: You can only set your availability for 90 days from today. We recommend you update your availability dates as often as you can - but we’ll send you an email to remind you, so don’t worry!

jobPreferences.label: Job Preferences
jobPreferences.text: Specify the type, industry, department, and location of your ideal role.

description.heading: Tell us about yourself
description.text: Help us and our employers get to know you better!

aboutYou.label: About me
aboutYou.text: Write a quick introduction about yourself, your career goals, and the type of role(s) you are looking for. Remember, this is the first thing employers will read about you — tell your story and make it interesting.
aboutYou.description: E.g. Hello! I’m a recent graduate from Oliv University with a major in Human Resources. I’m on the lookout for an opportunity that’ll let me merge together my passion for HR and psychology, and kickstart a career in Conflict Resolution/Crisis Communication. I enjoy the challenge of working with different types of people and coming up with solutions to difficult problems. It helps that I have a knack for staying calm during a storm!

websites.placeholder: Your homepage, portfolio or project e.g. website.com

additionalDocuments.label: Additional documents
additionalDocuments.text: Upload up to 5 documents (including Projects, Portfolios or Certificates) that will help strengthen your application. You’ll be able to attach anything less than 5MB, with these extensions: doc, docx, xls, xlsx, pdf, png, jpg, jpeg. Keep in mind, these files will be visible to our team and employers registered on Oliv.

CV.label: CV
CV.text: Upload up to 10 documents that will help strengthen your application. You’ll be able to attach anything less than 5MB, with these extensions: doc, docx, xls, xlsx, pdf, png, jpg, jpeg. Keep in mind, these files will be visible to our team and employers registered on Oliv.
CV.defaultCvTooltip: Your default CV will be shown to employers when they're searching for suitable candidates for a given vacancy.

description.heading: Bring out those pearly whites!
description.text: Add a photo and/or a video CV to show employers who you are.

profilePhoto.label: Profile photo
profilePhoto.text: Upload a picture of you in one of these formats: .png, .jpg, .jpeg (max 5 MB)

videoCV.label: Video CV
videoCV.text: Candidates with video CVs are 9 times more likely to be viewed by employers. Upload a 30-60 video CV introducing yourself. You can talk about your career goals, any special skills or projects, and the type of roles you're interested in.

availabilityTooltip.available: We ask candidates on Oliv to update their availability every 3 months. This candidate has confirmed that they are currently available and open to new opportunities.
availabilityTooltip.notAvailable: We ask candidates on Oliv to update their availability every 3 months. This candidate has not confirmed that they are currently available. They may or may not be open to new opportunities.

description.0: Proofread your descriptions to make sure there aren't any spelling mistakes or grammatical errors. We know it can be a little silly, but it's important. Try tools like Grammarly for a little extra help.
description.1: Your language teachers would have been proud. Great job on avoiding spelling mistakes and grammatical errors. We know it can be silly, but it's important.

description.0: This is usually one of the first things an employer will see on your profile. Avoid generic statements and focus on being more personal. Writing about your background and career goals is a great place to start.
description.1: This is usually one of the first things an employer will see on your profile. It's important to be personal and avoid generic statements — and you've done that very well.

description.0: Writing descriptions for work experiences can be super difficult — it's important to not keep them too long, but add enough detail. Try using this format: Accomplished [X] as measured by [Y] by doing [Z].
description.1: Writing descriptions for work experiences can be super difficult. You've done a great job by not keeping them too long and adding enough detail. We recommend using the format, accomplished [X] as measured by [Y] by doing [Z].

description.0: Writing descriptions for activities can be super difficult — it's important to not keep them too long, but add enough detail. Try using this format: accomplished [X] as measured by [Y] by doing [Z].
description.1: Writing descriptions for activities can be super difficult. You've done a great job by not keeping them too long and adding enough detail. We recommend using the format, accomplished [X] as measured by [Y] by doing [Z].

description.0: Humans are visual creatures, use your photo to give off a warm and approachable personality. Use a high-quality photo of head-to-shoulders or head-to-waist, and don't forget to smile!
description.1: Humans are visual creatures and you've done a great job giving off a warm and approachable personality. It's important to use a high-quality photo of head-to-shoulders or head-to-waist, and don't forget to smile!

description.0: Try using or borrowing a high-resolution camera to take a video in landscape mode. A plain or light background in daylight usually is best. For perfect sound, try using a mic or an empty quiet room can also works well.
description.1: Congratulations on uploading a high quality video CV. A plain or light background in daylight usually is best. For perfect sound, try using a mic or an empty quiet room can also works well.

description.0: This is your chance to show your wonderful personality to employers on our platform. Make sure you get personal and try avoiding generic statements.
description.1: This your chance to show your wonderful personality to employers on our platform. And oh my, how wonderful you are. It's important to get personal and try avoiding generic statements.

description.0: For a story to be meaningful it needs to inspire. Tell your story through clarity and passion. Show employers who you really are, what you can do and what you will one day be.
description.1: For a story to be meaningful it needs to inspire. Great job in telling your story through clarity and passion. Now employers can see who you really are, what you can do and what you will one day be.

description.0: Whilst you don't need Steven Speilberg production quality on your Video Cv, it definitely helps to have decent lighting levels and clear audio. The best Video CVs are 30 - 90 seconds in length, and focus on showcasing personality and enthusiasm.

botClosableMessage.employer: Hey there! I'm Olivia, Oliv's shortlisting bot. Whenever you post a role, I keep an eye out for candidates who may be a great fit and the shortlist them for you. Before shortlisting any candidate, I reconfirm their interest, availability and acceptance of the working location and compensation, based on what you've entered in your job post. I usually present shortlists within 7-10 days of a job being posted and will send updates every week or so.
botClosableMessage.candidate: Hey there! I'm Olivia, Oliv's shortlisting bot. I look out for great candidates like you to shortlist directly to employers on Oliv. If I think you may be a strong fit for a role, I'll need to ask you a few questions to reconfirm your interest and availability. Please complete all of my questions within 3 days in order to be shortlisted. And for any other support, reach us anytime at olivia@oliv.com

contactPage.aboutUsMore_1: Oliv is an online portal made for the youth in MENA. We're connecting talented students and new graduates to leading employers for internships, part-time and graduate jobs.
contactPage.aboutUsMore_2: MENA has a youth unemployment rate almost twice the global average — we're solving this problem through technology, empowering communities and building partnerships.

pricingPage.aboutPricing: No more expensive recruiting agencies and unreliable job boards. Our flexible pricing options are designed to fit your needs without breaking the bank.

single.howManyHires: I want to hire 1 or 2 people
single.planTypeMore: Get a 30 day active job opening and CV search

multiple.howManyHires: I want to hire multiple people
multiple.planTypeMore: Pay on a plan and hire as many people as you need.

faqQuestions.aboutProcess: What is the legal process to hire interns?
faqQuestions.aboutProcessAnswer: Hiring interns is legal in Mainland UAE and all Free Zones. The processes differ from each commercial zone, so we built an {{internVisaGuide}} to help. We suggest contacting your respective regulatory authority to learn more.
faqQuestions.aboutShortlistingAnswer: Your dedicated account manager will send you a hand-picked shortlist of 5 relevant, available and talented candidates making hiring easier than ever. Our shortlisting service has a 95% success rate.
faqQuestions.aboutPayment: How much do I pay interns & junior staff?
faqQuestions.aboutPaymentAnswer: Oliv does not govern the compensation package that an employer offers to a candidate, but we always encourage some sort of stipend to increase the appeal of your position. We've created a {{compensationGuide}} to help.
faqQuestions.aboutHiring: Can I only hire interns on your platform?
faqQuestions.aboutHiringAnswer: You can certainly hire more than interns! Oliv can be used to hire for internships, part-time and graduate jobs. Our community of is made up of students and fresh graduates of up to 3 years of experience.

client1.name: Diana Smith
client1.paragraph: “Oliv analyzed my resume before finding the most suitable job for me. They truly know how to fulfill the needs of graduates by selecting the right candidates for every position. Registering on Oliv is one of the best decisions I've made.”

faqQuestions.ans1: Yes, the resumes are ATS approved, ensuring compatibility with applicant tracking systems used by hiring managers.
faqQuestions.qus2: What do I need to do to start the resume writing process?
faqQuestions.ans2: To start the resume writing process, choose a package, make the payment, and create or complete your profile. We will then connect with you via email.
faqQuestions.qus3: How long does the process take?
faqQuestions.ans3: The process typically takes  5 days, from sharing information to receiving and working on the final draft.
faqQuestions.ans4: You can contact us by visiting our website, sending us E-mail team@oliv.com, or filling out the contact form.
faqQuestions.qus5: If I need customized resumes or CV letters for different niches, what should I do?
faqQuestions.ans5: If you need customized resumes or cover letters for different jobs, simply contact us, to discuss it further.
faqQuestions.qus6: How do you do Linkedin Makeovers?
faqQuestions.ans6: We perform LinkedIn Makeovers by revamping your profile, including attention-grabbing content, optimizing it with relevant keywords and top skills, suggesting profile branding improvements such as profile photos, cover photos, and posts, and providing a professional and comprehensive bio.
faqQuestions.qus7: Can I request revisions to my resume or cover letter?
faqQuestions.ans7: Yes, you can request 2 to 3 revisions (based on the package you choose) to ensure your resume or cover letter meets your expectations.

aboutPage.mainTitle: We build technology and empower young communities
aboutPage.mainDescription: <0>Launched in 2013, we set out to tackle a huge problem - <1>a 30% youth unemployment rate in the MENA region.</1> Oliv helps university students and graduates launch their careers. And we're pretty good at it.</0><1>Today, it's home to thousands of students and graduates where their ambitions are aligned to opportunity. More than 1,000 businesses from startups to Fortune 500s use Oliv to hire top emerging talent to maintain a healthy talent pipeline and grow their business for the future.</1><2>Our goal is to make launching careers simple, personal and rewarding. That's Oliv.</2>

rejectedCandidateBox.title: Your profile has been rejected
rejectedCandidateBox.cannotApply: <0>You cannot apply for jobs as your profile has been rejected. </0><1>View message</1>
rejectedCandidateBox.content: Unfortunately your profile does not meet Oliv's criteria for profile activation.
rejectedCandidateBox.fullMessage: <0>Your profile may have been rejected due to the following reasons:</0><1><0>Your profile does not meet Oliv's required standards for profile activation.</0><1>You have 2 or more years of work experience.</1></1><2>We try very hard to make sure our students and new graduates are given a fair chance to prove themselves and launch their careers. This involves several screening processes and verifications.</2><3>We use a maximum of 2 years of experience as a general rule of thumb to be a member of the Oliv community, there are exceptions to the rule in special circumstances. This is so we can create a safe zone for our candidates where they don't feel intimidated to apply alongside more mature and experienced professionals.</3><4>Any sort of workplace experience of over 2 years holds a lot of value on its own and gives you an unfair advantage over the rest of our community and for this reason we cannot approve your profile. We hope that makes sense, please let us know if we can answer any questions or concerns you might have.</4><5>Happy hunting.</5>

testimonial1.author: Nouran ElMedany
testimonial1.jobDetails: Creative Graphic Design Intern @ Turner Broadcasting
testimonial1.description: The job hunting journey is challenging for fresh graduates. You get lost with all the roles out there, what should be in your CV, how to introduce yourself.. it can be overwhelming. But that was until I start applying through Oliv. Oliv gives you the help you need to stand out to employers with great tips on how to perfect your profile and master your interviews. Oliv gives you the first and right step towards your dream job.

testimonial2.author: Jonathan Paulson
testimonial2.description: Right through university and out of it, Oliv has been matching me up with great opportunities at great companies. The team really builds a valuable relationship and goes the extra mile for me. They filled a missing gap for a lot of us young professionals early in our careers.

testimonial3.author: Mahitab El-Sawi
testimonial3.description: Oliv has really been a wonderful source of career-launching opportunities. What makes the platform stand out is their constant feedback and update calls, providing candidates with constant human contact, making you feel well taken care of.

testimonial4.author: Mikaeel Khataw
testimonial4.description: Oliv has been a phenomenal platform for me as a fresh graduate looking for internships to enhance my experience. It is the most reliable platform I have used, and I was contacted by the organisations I had applied to in a short period of time. The team at Oliv are extremely helpful and are always willing to help.

testimonial5.author: Kaouther Akid
testimonial5.description: Oliv gave me lots of help and support when I was still a recent graduate with no work experience in the UAE. My current job as a marketing coordinator & graphic designer at Givaudan started as an internship I found through Oliv. For that, I'm forever grateful. Keep doing what you're doing because you are really making a difference!

customPlans.description: Looking for something more specific? At Oliv, our recruitment solutions are designed to simplify the talent hunt, catering to your precise hiring needs.
